name: SlashMates
description:
battle against different types of enemies or even against other players.
Progress through levels and unlock more weapons to help yourself progress the game.

Mechanism
The battle works in a way that the player stands couple of feet from their opponents
and swings his sword(while press trigger) to launch an attack that travels towards the opponent as form
of a 'Magical' Projectile.
The player can defend incoming attack by simply touching a projectile with his weapon.

Supported Devices: Oculus Quest
